bug.author: loretoparisi
bug.summary: ImportError: Matplotlib backend_wx and backend_wxagg require wxPython >=2.8.12
bug.description: This is another potential issue when in macOS that can be handled changing matplotlib settings in ~/.matplotlib/matplotlibrc: with backend : MacOSX

comments.comment: Can you confirm this permanently fixed your issue with matplotlib in your case? If so, I will add that into the Known issues / Troubleshooting section of the Readme for people who might encounter the same problem, since unfortunately it cannot be fixed on my end. Except if I ported the whole Project to Python >=2.8, but this seems overblown for this easily fixable problem on a specific platform.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/f90>@f90</denchmark-link> Yes I confirm, this is a well known issue with when on macOS.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/f90>@f90</denchmark-link> by the way there is another trick!!! You can even define your local .
